home.title: Super Dice
home.gameintro: Super Dice is an EOS blockchain game.
home.referraltitle: Introduce the game to your friends and get the prize!!!!
home.refline1: Please share the referral link to your friends. The benifits are:
home.refline2: 1. You can get 1% of total bet of your frends who join Super Dice through the referral link.
home.refline3: 2. You friends who joined the game with a referral link can received extra 0.5% more payout if they win.
